messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Business
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/5/2000 9:47:42 PM Central Daylight Time, czuniga145@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/5/2000 9:47:42 PM Central Daylight Time,
czuniga145@... writes:

<< I teach
people how to schedule their lives, stop being drained by people, places
and
things, organize their finances, give back to their community, do something
that's fun, work on their spiritual side and relax. I have several clients
that homeschool their kids and many more that want to and don't know how to
get the balance in their lives to accomplish that. >>
>>


How do you get such a job? or did you start your own business? I would love
to do something similar. I have some ideas, but don't know how to start.
Evelyn

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Business
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/5/2000 7:47:46 PM US Mountain Standard Time, czuniga145@aol.com writes:  Yes Candice it is an
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/5/2000 7:47:46 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
czuniga145@... writes:

<< What an incredible job! Lucky you. >>

Yes Candice it is an incredible job. However luck has nothing to do with
it...(LOL) wish that it did. It took me a long time to figure out what I
wanted to do and then had to go and do it. It's certainly worth following my
dreams of having my kids at home and having a business that I can work around
them.

Dawn F

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Business
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/5/00 2:38:31 PM Pacific Daylight Time, NumoAstro@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/5/00 2:38:31 PM Pacific Daylight Time, NumoAstro@...
writes:

<< I'm a Personal Coach... I work with individuals, small businesses and
corporations on finding the balance in life with regards to work,
relationships, spirituality, volunteering, emotional and physical health and
having fun and enjoying life. I teach people how to take care of themselves
first so they can take care of everything else in their lives. I teach
people how to schedule their lives, stop being drained by people, places and
things, organize their finances, give back to their community, do something
that's fun, work on their spiritual side and relax. I have several clients
that homeschool their kids and many more that want to and don't know how to
get the balance in their lives to accomplish that. >>

What an incredible job! Lucky you.
candice

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Business
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Evelyn: I m a Personal  Coach... I work with individuals, small businesses and corporations on finding the balance in life with regards to work,
messages.messageBody:
Hi Evelyn:

I'm a Personal Coach... I work with individuals, small businesses and
corporations on finding the balance in life with regards to work,
relationships, spirituality, volunteering, emotional and physical health and
having fun and enjoying life. I teach people how to take care of themselves
first so they can take care of everything else in their lives. I teach
people how to schedule their lives, stop being drained by people, places and
things, organize their finances, give back to their community, do something
that's fun, work on their spiritual side and relax. I have several clients
that homeschool their kids and many more that want to and don't know how to
get the balance in their lives to accomplish that.

Thanks for giving me the opportunity to put that down in again. Each time I
get the opportunity to do that affirms that I'm in the right place in my
life. Doing what I love in my life affords my husband and I the opportunity
to be with our kids.

Dawn F
Tucson, AZ
